Day 1 — Portland to Lincoln City
- Pick up car at PDX airport (Hertz, confirmation HZ-8821946)

- Stop at Heceta Head Lighthouse for photos
- Oregon Dunes — quick stop if time allows
- Find a hotel somewhere near Gold Beach or Brookings for the night

Day 3 — Gold Beach to Crescent City, CA
- Sunrise hike near Pistol River State Scenic Viewpoint
- Lunch on the way — somewhere near Port Orford
- Check in at Curly Redwood Lodge, Crescent City (booked, confirmation CURL-9901)
- Visit Redwood National Park — Stout Grove trail (easy walk, great for kids)
- Sunset at Crescent Beach overlook

That's the 3-day coastal leg. More days coming once we figure out the inland route.
